summary: The Emmerson family heads to the quaint town of Turkey Hollow to visit Aunt Cly. Tim and Annie quickly grow bored without the Internet, and soon try to track the howling hoodoo, an elusive monster the locals dismiss as a legend.
cast: Mary Steenburgen|Jay Harrington|Graham Verchere|Genevieve Buechner|Reese Alexander|Gabe Khouth|Peter New|Linden Banks|Ludacris|Alice Dinnean|Rob Mills|Jason Hopley|Gord Robertson|Elliot Mandelcorn|Kathryn Kirkpatrick
title: Jim Henson's Turkey Hollow
